sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"劝说，劝导，劝诱"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: induce, persuade, urge, convince, counsel, coax
means: induce ： 指用讲道理来使某人做某事。
persuade ： 普通用词，指通过劝说、感情交流等而使对方做劝说者所希望的事。
urge ： 语气强，指不断地热情地规劝诱导。
convince ： 指凭行动、事实或言语使他人从思想感情上信服。
counsel ： 较正式用词，指对一些较重大事情所提出的劝告。有时也用于非正式场合，但仍强调严肃的一面。
coax ： 指用好话善意或耐心劝诱、哄骗某人做某事。

sentence.Network_en: I'm not going to believe it myself, never mind convince anyone else.
sentence.Network_cn: 我自己都不会相信，更别提说服别人了。

sentence.Network_en: It became clear that I hadn't been able to convince Mike.
sentence.Network_cn: 我显然没有能够说服迈克。

sentence.Network_en: You'll need to convince them of your enthusiasm for the job.
sentence.Network_cn: 你要使他们相信你殷切希望得到这份工作。

when a dream of trying to convince you to go against your conscience ., 我还幻想着可以战胜你的良知来说服你.
研究证据,并将证据的强度分为4个等级:令人信服的证据(convincing evidence)、很可能的证据(probable evidence)、可能的证据(possible evidence)、不充足的证据(.
耕作轩的博客！！... ... consult with sb.about sth 向某人请教、咨询 convince sb.of sth 说服某人 correspond to 相当于.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'overcome, defeat in argument'): from Latin convincere, from con- 'with' + vincere 'conquer'. Compare with convict

entry.def: If someone or something convinces you of something, they make you believe that it is true or that it exists.

example.ex: Although I soon convinced him of my innocence, I think he still has serious doubts about my sanity...
example.tran: 虽然我很快便让他相信我是清白的，但是我想他仍然非常怀疑我是否神志正常。

example.ex: The waste disposal industry is finding it difficult to convince the public that its operations are safe.
example.tran: 废物处理行业发现很难让公众相信其操作是安全的。

entry.def: If someone or something convinces you to do something, they persuade you to do it.

example.ex: That weekend in Plattsburgh, he convinced her to go ahead and marry Bud.
example.tran: 在普拉茨堡的那个周末，他说服她嫁给巴德。

means.word_mean: 1. make (someone) agree, understand, or realize the truth or validity of something;

sentences.sentence: "He had finally convinced several customers of the advantages of his product"

auth_sentence.content: This is how they manage to convince the listener.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is how they manage to convince the listener.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is how they manage to convince the listener.

auth_sentence.content: They are still trying to convince me against pregnancy.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are still trying to convince me against pregnancy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are still trying to convince me against pregnancy.

auth_sentence.content: Go look at causes of death to convince me.
auth_sentence.res_content: Go look at causes of death to convince me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Go look at causes of death to convince me.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人心服的;有说服力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: convince[v.[of]使信服,使确信]+ing……的→adj.令人心服的;有说服力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不可征服的,难以制服的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+vinc征服,克服+ible可..的→不可征服的
con全部+vinc征服,克服+e→彻底征服了对方→使信服,使确信
e出+vinc征服,克服+e→克服障碍,表达感情→使[人]确信

Sentence.sentence: I think your article in the school newspaper is right on target, and your viewpoints have certainly convinced me.

means.word_mean: 使相信; 使明白，使确信，使信服

sentences.en: Compulsion will never result in convincing them.
sentences.cn: 强迫永远不会使他们信服。

jushi.english: Are you a hundred per cent convinced yourself?
jushi.chinese: 你百分之百地相信你自己吗?

jushi.english: Compulsion will never result in convincing them.
jushi.chinese: 强迫永远不会使他们信服。
